contentrichtext.text: '''Kosova''' is the name of several places around the world: *Kosova, the Albanian and Turkish name of '''[[Kosovo (disambiguation)|Kosovo]]'''. *[[Kosova, Maglaj]], a village in the Maglaj municipality of central Bosnia and Herzegovina. *[[Kosova, Foča]], a village in the Foča municipality of south-eastern Bosnia and Herzegovina. *[[Kosova, Estonia]], a village in south-eastern Estonia. *[[Kosova, Belarus]], a small town in south-western Belarus. *[[Kosova Hora]], Czech Republic. In relation to Kosovo: *Kosova (ship), a ship of the [[Ottoman Navy]]. *[[Kosova Airlines]], airline founded in 2004. *[[Kosova's News Agency]], news agency founded in 1999. Unrelated to the above: *[[Bantu Kosova]], people in Kenya who are also known as the [[Gusii people|Gusii]]. *Günay Kosova (b. 1946), Turkish film director, producer and writer. *Zehra Kosova (1910-2001), Turkish communist activist and writer. See also: [[Kosava (disambiguation)|Kosava]] {{disambig}}
